lmm.controller.user

Class FilmListController

  • java.lang.Object
    • lmm.controller.MainController
      • lmm.controller.user.FilmListController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IFilmListController, IMainController

    public class FilmListController
extends MainController
implements IFilmListController
    This class manage the films list of the application.
    Author:
    Roberto Reibaldi

      This method generate a film list ordered by the year of release of the films and filtered by the variable filter.
